Contacting the ``pkgme`` developers
===================================

You can reach the ``pkgme`` developers through a few different means.

Mailing List
------------

The `developers team on Launchpad <https://launchpad.net/~pkgme-devs>`_ hosts
a mailing list which can be used to contact the developers. You can subscribe to
the list by joining the team and opting to subscribe to the mailing list. You must
be a member of the team to post to the list.

IRC
---

The developers hang out on the ``#pkgme`` channel on irc.freenode.net. 

Bug Reports
-----------

You can `report bugs on Launchpad. <https://bugs.launchpad.net/pkgme>`_
